Uses of Class
chess.Location

    • Uses of Location in chess

      Methods in chess that return Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location Rook.getLocation()
      This method returns the current location of the rook.
      Location Queen.getLocation()
      This method returns the current location of the queen.
      Location Pawn.getLocation()
      This method returns the current location of the pawn.
      Location Knight.getLocation()
      This method returns the current location of the knight.
      Location King.getLocation()
      This method returns the current location of the king.
      Location Bishop.getLocation()
      This method returns the current location of the bishop.
      Methods in chess with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Rook.canMove(Location newLoc, Board b)
      This method checks if the rook can move to a specified location on the board.
      boolean King.canMove(Location newLoc, Board b)
      This method checks if the king can move to a specified location on the board.
      boolean Bishop.canMove(Location newLoc, Board b)
      This method checks if the bishop can move to a new location on the board given the new location and the board.
      boolean Player.move(Board b, Location init, Location to, char x, boolean isCopy)
      This method moves a piece from location to another, if it is allowed to do so.
      boolean Rook.moveTo(Location newLoc, Board b)
      This method takes into account whether or not there is a check on a king, in which case it can't move.
      boolean King.moveTo(Location newLoc, Board b)
      This method takes into account whether or not there is a check on a king, in which case it can't move.
      boolean Bishop.moveTo(Location newLoc, Board b)
      This method takes into account whether or not there is a check on a king, in which case the bishop can't move.
      void Rook.setLocation(Location newLoc)
      This method sets the location of the rook to a new Location.
      void Queen.setLocation(Location newLoc)
      This method sets the location of the queen to a new location.
      void Pawn.setLocation(Location newLoc)
      This method sets the location of the rook to a new Location.
      void Knight.setLocation(Location newLoc)
      This method sets the location of the knight to a new Location.
      void King.setLocation(Location newLoc)
      This method sets the location of the rook to a new Location.
      void Bishop.setLocation(Location newLoc)
      This method sets the location of the bishop to a new given location.
